column1: Kata Robata////To add to our gluttony
column2: we also ordered some sushi and a few sushi rolls. We had some chopped scallop
column4: and uni (sea urchin). The scallop and hamachi were amongst some of the best we've had in Houston. Unfortunately
column5: the uni was not as sweet and fresh as we've had in other restaurants. Perhaps it was just this batch.
